title: Profile 1

headers.name: X-Forwarded-For
headers.comment: This header tells the website that the request is coming from 1.1.1.2

headers.name: Host
headers.comment: This header tells the website the original host name of the request

urlFilters.comment: This filter applies the headers only to HTTPS requests

comment: This profile forces websites to use the 1.1.1.2 DNS server with malware-blocking
